title: Sweat and Tonic
sub: UI Design & Development for a Smart Touch Control Panel (IoT development)
description1: Designed a user interface using Figma for the smart touch control pfanel, optimized for Crestron TS-1070 touch screen and mobile devices, to be deployed at Sweat and Tonic Yoga Studio.
description2: Translated UI designs into code, integrated lighting, audio, and video control systems.

title: The Bloor
description1: Developed a Shopify theme using JavaScript and Liquid template language to meet client-specific requirements, including dynamic features and third-party API integration
description2: Conducted in-depth research on e-commerce UI/UX trends and analyzed data to improve the user experience and boost sales.

title: Portfolio (version 4)
description1: Updated my portfolio using Next.js for improved performance, modular code, and an enhanced user experience.

title: Style S
brief: E-commerce Platform built with React & Redux
description1: Features: 1). Google Sign In Authentication 2). Payment with Stripe API 3). Add items from Shop page 4). Remove items from Checkout page.
